stories.text: For all the developers out there, would you consider using (even buying) and Sentiment Analysis API that isn't based on ML (so a lexicon based algorithm)? It would be geared towards affordability and social media use (i.e. understanding emojis and other modern grammer). Thanks for your opinions!
stories.title: Sentiment Analysis API Question
Experience Experience Experience â€“ Edited Meta/Facebook 2021 Transcript

stories.text:
We are considering creating few internal tools to speed up the work of a few departments in our organization, but before starting development heads on, I would love to gather some wisdom from HN.

First, what tools are you developing?

How do you handle user authentication?

Do you develop one single big application for everything in your organization, or few distinct applications, each with its own specific goal?

Any specific thing to watch out for?

Thanks!
stories.title: Ask HN: How do you develop internal tools for your organization?
